# Welcome to my website!

My name is Arnim Seidlitz and I am postdoc at IAB institute for employment research of the Federal Employment Agency (BA) in Nuremberg, Germany. My research interests include family and labor economics and the economics of education. I gained my PhD from Humboldt University Berlin. If you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact me. 

My mail address is arnim.seidlitz@iab.de.
